head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LEVENBROWN, NAOMI LEWITTES

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LEVENBROWN, NAOMI LEWITTES

block.p: LEVENBROWN--Naomi Lewittes, on April 7, 2007, after a brave and arduous struggle. Beloved wife of Dr. Jack Levenbrown, cherished mother of Andrea and Dr. Salah Masry, adored grandmother of Zoe and Aidan Masry, dear sister of Debbie and Morrie Stampfer. Invaluable faculty member for 25 years of the Hebrew Academy of Five Towns and Rockaway High School (HAFTR), as teacher, guidance counselor, associate principal. Shiva at Levenbrown residence until Monday morning, April 16. Contributions to Naomi Levenbrown Scholarship Fund at HAFTR, 635 Central Ave, Cedarhurst, NY 11516.

LEVENBROWN--Naomi Lewittes, on April 7, 2007, after a brave and arduous struggle. Beloved wife of Dr. Jack Levenbrown, cherished mother of Andrea and Dr. Salah Masry, adored grandmother of Zoe and Aidan Masry, dear sister of Debbie and Morrie Stampfer. Invaluable faculty member for 25 years of the Hebrew Academy of Five Towns and Rockaway High School (HAFTR), as teacher, guidance counselor, associate principal. Shiva at Levenbrown residence until Monday morning, April 16. Contributions to Naomi Levenbrown Scholarship Fund at HAFTR, 635 Central Ave, Cedarhurst, NY 11516.
